description: A Node.js script for finalizing database migrations, verifying API responses, reading documentation sections, and running build checks in a CI or manual environment.

methods.name: logErr
methods.description: Logs error messages to the console.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes a command synchronously and throws an error if it fails.

methods.name: requestJson
methods.description: Performs an HTTP/HTTPS request and returns a promise resolving to the response with parsed JSON.

methods.name: getDemoGuideText
methods.description: Reads a README file and extracts the 'Demo Guide' section based on markdown headings.
